sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnunitylink ( UNITY_LINK_ID /* */ , UNITY_LINK_GROUP /* */ , UNITY_LINK_NM /* */ , UNITY_LINK_URL /* */ , UNITY_LINK_DC /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , UNITY_LINK_SE_CODE /* */ ) VALUES ( #unityLinkId# /* */ , #unityLinkGroup# /* */ , #unityLinkNm# /* */ , #unityLinkUrl# /* */ , #unityLinkDc# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #unityLinkSeCode# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnunitylink SET UNITY_LINK_ID=#unityLinkId# /* */ , UNITY_LINK_GROUP=#unityLinkGroup# /* */ , UNITY_LINK_NM=#unityLinkNm# /* */ , UNITY_LINK_URL=#unityLinkUrl# /* */ , UNITY_LINK_DC=#unityLinkDc# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , UNITY_LINK_SE_CODE=#unityLinkSeCode# /* */ WHERE UNITY_LINK_ID=#unityLinkId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT UNITY_LINK_ID /* */ , UNITY_LINK_GROUP /* */ , UNITY_LINK_NM /* */ , UNITY_LINK_URL /* */ , UNITY_LINK_DC /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , UNITY_LINK_SE_CODE /* */ FROM comtnunitylink WHERE UNITY_LINK_ID=#unityLinkId# /* */

SELECT UNITY_LINK_ID /* */ , UNITY_LINK_GROUP /* */ , UNITY_LINK_NM /* */ , UNITY_LINK_URL /* */ , UNITY_LINK_DC /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , UNITY_LINK_SE_CODE /* */ FROM comtnunitylink WHERE 1=1
UNITY_LINK_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
UNITY_LINK_GROUP LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY UNITY_LINK_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnunitylink WHERE 1=1
UNITY_LINK_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
UNITY_LINK_GROUP LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
